titleStmt.title: A Caueat or vvarning for all sortes of men both young and olde to auoid the company of lewd and wicked women to the tune of Virginia.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Contains an illustration at head of each of the four columns.
Right half of sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
